short_summary: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP) For TASK BASED INFORMATICS PROFESSIONAL SERVICES (TBIPS).
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP) For TASK BASED INFORMATICS PROFESSIONAL SERVICES (TBIPS).",
full_summary:
# Contract Opportunity

## Service Title

* **English**: NPP TBIPS Cloud Infrastructure Services
* **French**: APM SPICT Services d'infrastructure cloud

## Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: cb-319-64873700
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Solicitation Number**: 01B68-23-0203
* **Publication Date**: 2024-01-17
* **Closing Date**: 2024-02-01 14:00:00
* **Status**: Expiré (Expired)

## Procurement Details

* **UNSPSC Code**: 81110000
* **Description**: Computer services
* **Method of Procurement**: Concurrentielle (Competitive)
* **Selection Criteria**: Cote combinée la plus élevée pour le mérite technique et le prix (Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price)

## Trade Agreements

* This solicitation is covered under various trade agreements, including the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union (AECG) and others.

## Project Overview

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) invites suppliers to participate in a Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) agreement for Cloud Infrastructure Services. The successful supplier will provide expertise and resources to support AAFC's adoption of cloud infrastructure-as-a-service technologies in alignment with industry best practices.

## Additional Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* **Contact Person**: Kyle Harrington, kyle.harrington@agr.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: 5555555
* **Additional Documents**: [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29646/01b68-23-0203-npp-tbips-english.pdf) [French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29646/npp-%28french-23-0203.pdf)

Note: Please ensure to review the complete RFP documents and any additional attachments for a complete understanding of the solicitation. Ranked suppliers who have been authorized to bid will be notified separately. 

I changed from rambling on a lot of details that are actually "nice to know", to directly stating what makes this contract worthwhile for a company. Also, when giving the additional information, I added 'Additional Documents
